title: The Climbing Caricature
caricature_prompt: Create a playful, exaggerated caricature of someone who loves climbing, coding and cooking. Exaggerate the features dramatically - mouth, hands, eyes. Use clean line art and bold contours for minimal detail, suitable for robotic arm drawing. Style hints: bold lines and colors, bright shades to add energy. Show a person with a backpack full of climbing gear and coding books.
caption: A caricature inspired by your interests in climbing, coding, cooking, with exaggerated mouth, hands, eyes.
